    TCP Tunnel

    When you want to access a particular port of an ECS in a VPC, you can use TCP tunnel to map the port to FlexGW VM, then access the ECS port through FlexGW EIP.

    At first, add a TCP tunnel entry

    Go to the "New TCP tunnel" page:

    • Local port: is the FlexGW port for forwarding. In this case: 50000
    • Target IP: is the private IP of the ECS which want to access internet in VPC.. In this case: 10.0.0.1
    • Destination port: the port of the target ECS. In this case: 3306
    Second, check the TCP tunnel list

    When the new TCP tunnel entry added, it will automatically jump to the "TCP tunneling list" page, you can see:

    • Local port: is the FlexGW port for forwarding. In this case: 50000
    • Target IP: is the private IP of the ECS which want to access internet in VPC.. In this case: 10.0.0.1
    • Destination port: the port of the target ECS. In this case: 3306
    • Close: Click the 'Close' button to close the TCP tunnel, and take effect immediately.
